name: 2021 4th International Conference on Mechatronics, Robotics and Automation
content: Publicationï¼š All full papers accepted by ICMRA 2021 will be published into ICMRA 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases.
